Title: Bordados por la paz
Summary: The project aims to embroider hope and memory. When they have a considerable number of embroidered handkerchiefs, they display them in public squares all over the country

Title: Un gol por la paz
Summary: A Goal for Peace provides soccer training to coaches, mentors, youth and children, and incorporates educational workshops in leadership, tolerance, discipline, respect, motivation, teamwork, sport, sexual and reproductive education.

Title: Fotoperiodismo por la paz
Summary: El proyecto busca promover una cultura de paz, a través de diferentes miradas y fomentar la construcción de sociedades más abiertas, respetuosas y libres de violencia.

Title: Jovenes constructores
Summary: Promote leadership and couching to gang members to start their own businesses

Title: Miguel Angel Asturias Academy
Summary: The Academy is a non-profit K-12 school that since 1994 has worked with organizations and universities in the United States and Canada to provide scholarships for children from impoverished families.
